dialogue.text: Hey, we saw her out on Main Street last week performing with Sour!
We usually run into her at Uncle Hearty's. That's the first time I've seen her outside of that place.
Right, right. She's one of the nicest employees there too. I've always wanted to know more about her.
I didn't even know she played saxophone until last week!
I'm not finding too much about her online. Her social media is just selfies, artsy food pics, and quoted song lyrics.
I think she may be attending college here in Enzync, too, though I'm honestly not sure. She's the absolute definition of 'lowkey'.
Then it's best we keep it that way.
She's really good at playing sax, but she doesn't seem like she wants to make a name for herself with it.
Kind of a shame. Why choose to work a food service job with that kind of skill?
We could always ask her ourselves on our own time. I don't wanna intrude so much on her personal life on stream.
Well, someone in the chat did just ask us to talk about her, which sparked this discussion.
Oh! Look at that! Someone also just mentioned that they've heard her play with the Enzync City Night Crew! So she is putting her music work out there!
She ought to try and take her music career even more seriously, if you ask me.
Maybe. Though there's always the chance she doesn't want to turn her hobby into work.
Though now we definitely gotta take a midnight city walk one day and check out the Night Crew! I'd love to see Umami play again.
If there's any chance that Umami is tuning in right now, we'd all love to hear more of your superb sax skills!
